name: Is That a Telekinetic Monk?!
description:
This game was made for the Trijam #115 game jam with the theme "Drag & Drop" in the span of three hours.  You play (as the name suggests) as a telekinetic monk! Trying to use his telekinetic abilities against the forces of evil!  

  • GAMEPLAY:                                                                                                                                                 
  • Use your mouse to drag and drop the skulls into the spikes to get the highest score!
  • CONTROLS :                                                                                                                                                        
  •    wasd - move                                                                                                                                                 
  •     Mouse - drag & drop
